description:
Every year the flowers bloom. Mysterious Cherry Blossoms blooming all over a crescent shaped island. That island is the island of Hatsune...

The main character who goes to Kazami Academy, Asakura Junnichi, has the power to see the dreams of other people in his sleep. He was also taught magic by an old lady that allows him to create sweets.

One day, Junnichi seems to have seen someone's dream again while he was sleeping. Inside that dream, a girl who was a childhood friend of his appeared. But, he was woken up by his sister Asakura Nemu, forcing him to come back to his regular life. Nemu doesn't actually have any blood relation to Junnichi but their bond is deeper than other real brothers and sisters. So deep that it gives the illusion that they're lovers.

It was another peaceful normal day waking up early in the morning and going to Kazami Academy. Together with childhood friend Amakase Miharu, the academy idol Shirakawa Kotori, the two sisters Mizukoshi Moe and Mako who prefer eating nabe on the school roof for lunch. Going through their day as usual, their childhood friend, Yoshino Sakura, who they thought had moved to America suddenly appears. It was a surprise for Junnichi and Nemu. Sakura tells them, "I came to finish the promise we made during our childhood"...

(Source: AnimeNfo and AniDB)

tags.name: Female Harem
tags.description: Main cast features the protagonist plus several female characters who are romantically interested in them.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Amnesia
tags.description: Prominently features a character(s) with memory loss.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

node.description: Artist and character designer for various bishoujo games and companies. She designed, among others, Miyako Miyamura of ef - fairy tale of the two and Nemu Asakura of Da Capo.    She runs the doujin circle Ice and Choco.

**[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mill_sister)** | **[Website (blog)](https://blog.goo.ne.jp/gooussy)**

Kiyoko Sayama is a Japanese director, episode director, animation director and storyboard artist.

Married to [Tetsuya Kumagai](https://anilist.co/staff/101548/Tetsuya-Kumagai).

__[Website](https://coorie.futureartist.net/) | [Profile (Peak A Soul)](https://www.peakasoul.net/coorie) | [Blog (JP)](https://rinocoorie.exblog.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/rino_CooRie)__

__Formed:__ 2002 (as a two-piece unit), 2003 (as a solo unit)
__Disbanded:__ 2003 (as a two-piece unit)

__Biography:__
CooRie was a Japanese self-produced two-piece music unit under record labels Mellow Head and Lantis consisting of the members Rino and Naoyuki Osada, where Rino would perform the vocals and do the lyrics, while Osada would do the composition and arrangement. About a year after they formed, Osada would formally leave the unit in 2003, which is also when they disbanded as a two-piece unit. 

Rino decided to reform the music unit as a solo unit after Osada's departure, and has since been the sole member, who now performs the vocals, while also doing most of the lyrics and composition in the songs. When it comes to the arrangement, the unit largely collaborates with other creators, most prominently [Kaoru Ookubo](https://anilist.co/staff/150930/Kaoru-Ookubo), who has made the arrangement for 19 of CooRie's songs between 2005 and 2015.

__Members:__
- [Rino](https://anilist.co/staff/96532) (りの) – vocalist and in-charge of lyrics and composition

__Former Members:__
- Naoyuki Osada (長田直之) – keyboardist and in-charge of composition and arrangement
[Website](https://www.peakasoul.net/yozuca) | [Blog](https://blog.excite.co.jp/yozublog/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yozuca_astrsk)
__Hiromi Kikuta__ is a Japanese sound director, who works for the company Rakuonsha.

Masumi Itou is a singer and composer. Ito has composed the soundtracks to many anime television shows and is part of the bands Oranges & Lemons and Heart of Air. She graduated from Musashino College of Music, and her husband is music producer Yoshiyuki Ito.
Younger brother of mangaka [Yuuichi Hasegawa](https://anilist.co/staff/98161/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/nocturamayama)

Yamashita graduated from Kokugakuin University with a Major in History. He first started out in the industry in 1997 as a production assistant at JCF. Amazingly, he has never been formally trained in art. His talent for drawing was first discovered through various doodles and sketches he would make on company paperwork.

Yamashita's first project as an animator was on [the second Kochikame movie](https://anilist.co/anime/3547/). Some time later he went freelance. [Samurai Champloo](https://anilist.co/anime/205/) was the first project he worked on freelance. Around 2006, Yamashita joined [Bee Train](https://anilist.co/studio/5/) and started work as character designer and animation director on the TV show [Ginyuu Mokushiroku Meine Liebe Wieder](https://anilist.co/anime/771/). A short while later, the animation department at Bee Train was spun off into new company, [C-Station](https://anilist.co/studio/6074/), and Yamashita moved with it. Today he retains a seat at C-Station, but regularly contracts out to work on various external projects.

Circus is a Japanese visual novel studio known for creating adult-oriented bishoujo games. In addition to the normal Circus brand name, there are other brand divisions including Circus Northern, Circus Fetish, Circus Metal, and Sanctuary. Circus has also been involved in collaboration projects, creating titles such as True Tears, a collaboration with Broccoli, GameCrab, and Japanese artist Izumi Rei published under the brand La'cryma, and Sora o Tobu, Mittsu no Houhou., an adult-oriented collaboration with Broccoli released under the same brand name.    (Source: AniDB)

__[Website](https://akihata.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/akihata_jp) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/akihata.jp/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/AKIHATAjp)__

__Aki Hata__ is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer and member of the music production team [Q-MHz](https://anilist.co/staff/156926/QMHz).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/oitan125) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/花田十輝)

Jukki Hanada is a Japanese screenwriter and novelist. He is the grandson of literary critic and essayist Kiyoteru Hanada. He formerly belonged to [Takao Koyama's](https://anilist.co/staff/117575/Takao-Koyama) Brother Noppo anime scenario house. He's currently affiliated with SATZ.

He's a big fan of professional baseball and supports the Hiroshima Toyo Carp.
[Website](http://www.yugokanno.com/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/yugokanno)
[Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/桂憲一郎)
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tagashiran55)
Tomoyasu Kurashima is an animator, animation director, character designer and illustrator.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomos12)

He started working at Studio Deen, where he made his debut as animator in an episode of Dai Guard. After leaving Deen he became freelance and works mainly on productions for J.C.Staff but also on some titles for Bones, Gonzo and Feel. He is particularly renowned as bishoujo animator, since he tends to pay attention to detailed character appearance and traits for girls, as well as providing his characters cute and bashful gestures.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tomos12)
